FieldSet.description: BusinessProcess: CMDB Class that groups a structured sequence of activities that make up a business process or an IT process. A business process is a process performed by some combination of people, computers, and equipment to provide a business service or to deliver a product. An IT process is a business process performed by the IT department, such as the ITSM Change Management or Incident Management processes. This class has BMC_Component relationships to activity and subprocess instances. This class has no corresponding DMTF CIM class.
FieldSet.label: Business Process
